questions.question: Max stumbled upon an ancient tablet inscribed with 7 5/10. What does this mixed fraction simplify to as an improper fraction?
At the end of their journey, Timmy, Jenny, and Max found a hidden scroll. Which fraction on the scroll was an improper fraction?
Timmy encountered a problem in Fraction Forest where he needed to convert 75/30​ to a mixed fraction. What is the correct answer for Timmy?
Jenny saw a butterfly with fractions on its wings. Which fraction on the butterfly's wings was an improper fraction?
Timmy, Jenny, and Max, while exploring Fraction Forest, found stones with carvings 541/530, 358/464, and 555/565 respectively. Identify the improper fraction.
Timmy uncovered a hidden scroll with 20 7/9​. What is the improper fraction equivalent of this mixed fraction?
Timmy and Jenny combined their findings and encountered 5 9/5 engraved on a tree. What is this mixed fraction when converted to an improper fraction?
During their journey, Timmy found a flower with fractions on its petals. Which petal had an improper fraction?
Max collected some berries, each labeled with a fraction. Which berry had an improper fraction?
Jenny discovered a magical scroll with the fraction 3 3/11​. What is the improper fraction equivalent of this mixed fraction?
Jenny found another relic showing 10 7/6. What is the improper fraction representation of this mixed fraction?
Max stumbled upon a rock with a fraction etched into it. If the fraction was improper, what fraction did Max see?
Max was exploring the depths of Fraction Forest and came across 93/15​. What is 93/15 in mixed fraction form?
Near the end of their journey, Timmy, Jenny, and Max found a hidden scroll. Which fraction on the scroll was an improper fraction?
Max uncovered a hidden scroll with 4 1/10​. What is the improper fraction equivalent of this mixed fraction?
While traveling through Fraction Forest, the apprentices encountered 78/9. What is 78/9 in mixed fraction form?
Timmy the apprentice found a treasure chest containing a mixed fraction. The fraction was 7 6/9​. What is this mixed fraction as an improper fraction?
While exploring deeper into the Fraction Forest, Timmy spotted 3 3/20​ carved on a stone. What does this mixed fraction simplify to as an improper fraction?
As they walked through the Fraction Forest, Timmy found a tree with a fraction carved into it. Which of the following fractions did Timmy find if it was an improper fraction?
Jenny found 61/7 ​ written on a magical tree in Fraction Forest. What is 61/7 as a mixed fraction?
